description: An upbeat 'Koplo' track, featuring dynamic percussion, lively rhythms, and traditional instruments like the kendang and suling. The melody should be catchy and energetic, encouraging listeners to dance. Incorporate modern electronic elements to give it a contemporary feel, while maintaining the authentic essence of Dangdut Koplo.
title: Kopi Dangdut
name: 01_Kopi_Dangdut
